description: Crystal Palace: Ask your pre-season Eagles questions
title: Crystal Palace: Ask your pre-season Eagles questions
title_page: Crystal Palace: Ask your pre-season Eagles questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Palace in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
We'll put a selection of your questions on all things Eagles to our BBC Sport reporter for their insider take - so ask whatever you'd like to know.
